resources.string: This app is an initiative to help those hardworking students who find it difficult to get out of the bed. What’s new? We believe that motivation is the key point for anyone’s success, and beginning the complete day with a motivational video can boost up your productivity level to pro. So just set any motivational video of your choice, either from YouTube or your from your phone, and make your way towards success. Note: the Alarm will not be dismissed until you solve a math problem over the screen.....................
Click above button to open YouTube in App, select desired video,click share and copy the link, paste above and then submit. See below image for reference.
